page.para: I am a big girl. I go out of the house a/lone.
It is so dark! Is some/one there? Who is it?
It is only the cat. I am not a/fraid.
I can see some/thing big and dark! What is it?
It is on/ly the well. I am not a/fraid.
I hear a sound. Creak, creak, creak! What is it?
It is on/ly my sis/ter get/ting wa/ter from the well. I am not a/fraid.
I hear foot/steps! Who is it? Who is it?
It is on/ly my moth/er. She has come home from work.
I am a big girl now. I am not a/fraid of an/y/thing.
